A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Man\, what a freaking disappointment on so many levels.  The character of Luke Skywalker was a freaking wus.  In the origionals he was the guy that could not be convined that his father was a lost cause\, and he proved everybody was wrong.  Seeking out the good in an almost black hole of a man.  In this one\, he nearly kills his nephew because he feels a sliver of darkness in him.  Come on man!!!  And then the whole space chase details of the story. :thumbsDown.
